abstract.t: SR Policy is a set of candidate SR paths consisting of one or more segment lists and necessary path attributes. It enables instantiation of an ordered list of segments with a specific intent for traffic steering. DetNet provides the capability to carry specified unicast or multicast data flows with extremely low data loss rates and bounded end-to-end latency within a network domain. This document defines the SR policy enhancement to carry the Bounded Latency Information with a candidate path of SR policy. So that BLI behavior can be enabled automatically when the SR Policy is applied.
